org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def
Class AeOperationSignatureMatcher

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def.AeMessageMatcher
      org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def.AeOperationSignatureMatcher
public class AeOperationSignatureMatcher
extends AeMessageMatcher

Utility class that finds an operation given a WSDL for the port type and the Document[]. This routine is designed for doc literal operations only. It will match the data against the available operations to figure out what operation is being invoked.

Field Summary
private  AeBPELExtendedWSDLDef mDef
          def that contains the port type - will have access to the messages either directly or through imports

          name of the operation or null if not found

isMatchForOperationName

protected boolean isMatchForOperationName(javax.wsdl.Operation aOperation)
Convenience method that checks if the operation name matches the operation name we're looking for. If the operation name wasn't set on the matcher then we'll match against any operation provided that the data matches the message's parts.

Parameters:
aOperation -

foundMatch

public boolean foundMatch()
Returns true if we were able to find a match
